title: Person of Interest 5x08 Sneak Peek "Reassortment" (HD)
author: televisionpromosdb
description:
Person of Interest 5x08 "Reassortment" Sneak Peek - Reese and Finch become trapped in a hospital that becomes ground zero for a deadly viral outbreak. Also, Samaritan’s newest recruit has second thoughts and Shaw continues to struggle with reality, on PERSON OF INTEREST, Tuesday, May 24th on CBS.
